Uses of Package
org.fluidity.foundation

  • Packages that use org.fluidity.foundation 
    Package Description
    org.fluidity.composition
    Dependency injection container interface and supporting artifacts.
    org.fluidity.composition.container
    Service provider interfaces to be used by the dependency injection container implementation.
    org.fluidity.composition.spi
    Service provider interfaces to handle special cases of software composition in Fluid Tools.
    org.fluidity.deployment.osgi
    Managed component model for OSGi services, and components depending thereon.
    org.fluidity.features
    Fluid Tools features that are independent of the main Fluid Tools functionality.
    org.fluidity.foundation
    Utilities to support basic tasks.
    org.fluidity.foundation.jarjar
    Stream protocol handler to work with resources inside JAR archives embedded in other JAR archives.
    org.fluidity.foundation.spi
    Service provider interfaces for foundation utilities.
    org.fluidity.foundation.testing
    Utilities to simplify unit testing Fluid Tools components.
    org.fluidity.testing
    Utilities to simplify unit testing with EasyMock.
  • Classes in org.fluidity.foundation used by org.fluidity.composition 
    Class and Description
    Utility
    Abstract superclass that prevents instantiation of its subclasses.
  • Classes in org.fluidity.foundation used by org.fluidity.composition.container 
    Class and Description
    Exceptions.Wrapper
    An unchecked exception that wraps a checked exception.
    Log
    Log interface to use by dependency injected components.
  • Classes in org.fluidity.foundation used by org.fluidity.composition.spi 
    Class and Description
    Command.Job
    Extends the Runnable concept to commands that can throw some exception.
  • Classes in org.fluidity.foundation used by org.fluidity.deployment.osgi 
    Class and Description
    Command.Process
    Extends the Runnable concept to commands that can return some value and throw some exception.
    Exceptions.Wrapper
    An unchecked exception that wraps a checked exception.
  • Classes in org.fluidity.foundation used by org.fluidity.features 
    Class and Description
    Command.Job
    Extends the Runnable concept to commands that can throw some exception.
  • Classes in org.fluidity.foundation used by org.fluidity.foundation 
    Class and Description
    Archives.Entry
    Selects and reads entries in a JAR file.
    Archives.Entry.Reader
    Reads one entry from an archive.
    Command.Function
    Extends the Runnable concept to commands that can take some parameter, return some value, and throw some exception.
    Command.Process
    Extends the Runnable concept to commands that can return some value and throw some exception.
    Configuration.Query
    Groups configuration queries to provide settings consistency.
    Deferred.Label
    A lazy-initialized label.
    Deferred.Reference
    A reference to some object that is lazily instantiated.
    Exceptions.Tunnel
    Implements the actual exception wrapping / unwrapping functionality described at Exceptions.
    Exceptions.Wrapper
    An unchecked exception that wraps a checked exception.
    Generics.Parameters
    Works around http://bugs.sun.com/view_bug.do?bug_id=5087240.
    IOStreams.Output
    Byte array sink.
    Log
    Log interface to use by dependency injected components.
    Methods.Selector
    Allows the caller of Methods.get() to find a method without referring to it by name.
    Proxies.Identity
    Provides object identity to some proxy.
    ServiceProviders.Log
    Provides means to emit log messages without having Log available.
    Utility
    Abstract superclass that prevents instantiation of its subclasses.
